title: China’s Fossil Fuel Power Generation Set For First Fall In A Decade
description: China will see its power generation from fossil fuel-linked plants fall for the first time in a decade this year, after a sharp turnaround in renewable energy use in November.China’s fossil-fuelled power generation fell 4.2% year-on-year in November, statistics bureau data showed on Monday to...

title: OPEC Secretary General proposes rethinking term 'fossil fuel'
description: Haitham Al Ghais noted that oil itself is rarely used as a fuel, as it is processed into various products, only some of which are fuels

title: Peering Into the Rio Grande Valley’s Fossil Fuel Future
description: Editor’s Note: This is part one of what will be a two-part series supported by the Pulitzer Center and the Ida B. Wells Society Investigative Reporting Fellowship. (Leer en español aquí.) For the Gulf Coast oil and gas industry, the mini-region around the 50-mile-long Laguna Madre is the final frontier. A rare hypersaline lagoon that [...]The post Peering Into the Rio Grande Valley’s Fossil Fuel Future appeared first on The Texas Observer.
